no.uib.triogen.io.genotypes.vcf.generic

Class VcfVariant

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uib.triogen.io.genotypes.vcf.generic.VcfVariant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenotypesProvider

    public class VcfVariant
extends Object
implements GenotypesProvider
    The VcfVariant provides genotypes for a variant from a vcf file.
    Author:
    Marc Vaudel

      Returns the dosages for the given sample as a string.

      Returns the hard-called genotype for a given sample.

      Returns the number of alternative alleles using dosages.

      • getNAltH

        public short[] getNAltH(String childId,
                        String motherId,
                        String fatherId)
        Description copied from interface: GenotypesProvider
        Returns the number of alternative alleles for each h of a trio according to the nomenclature of Chen et al. (https://doi.org/10.1101/737106) as an array [h1, h2, h3, h4].
        Specified by:
        getNAltH in interface GenotypesProvider
        Parameters:
        childId - The id of the child.
        motherId - The id of the mother.
        fatherId - The id of the father.
        Returns:

      • getParentsDosageP0sCache

        public float[] getParentsDosageP0sCache()
        Description copied from interface: GenotypesProvider
        Returns the p0s for all parents of the given child ids. Mothers first and then fathers, in the order of the child ids.
        Specified by:

        The p0s in an array.
